text: Codine is a 1963 French Romanian crime movie directed by Henri Colpi and starring Alexandru Virgil Platon, Françoise Brion, Nelly Borgeaud, Răzvan Petrescu. At the 1963 Cannes Film Festival, it won the award for Best Screenplay. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1963 crime movies Category:French crime movies Category:Romanian crime movies
title: Codine
